title: How to Say You Are Beautiful in French

steps.title: Tell a woman she is beautiful with "Tu es belle."
steps.content: Tell a woman she is beautiful with "Tu es belle." This literally translates to "You are beautiful." The first part, "tu es" means "you are," and the word "belle" translates as "beautiful." [1] X Research source "Tu es belle" is pronounced as "Two eh bell."

steps.title: Use the formal "vous êtes belle" when talking to superiors, the elderly, or distinguished people.
steps.content: Use the formal "vous êtes belle" when talking to superiors, the elderly, or distinguished people. "Vous" is the formal version of "tu," and is used in "proper" conversation. Though there is no hard and fast rule for when to use "vous," a good rule of thumb is to use it for anyone you would refer to as "Ms." or "Mrs." in English. [2] X Research source Pronounce this as "vooz eht bell." Note how there is no "s" at the end of belle when speaking to one person.

steps.title: Tell multiple women they are beautiful by saying "Vous êtes belles."
steps.content: Tell multiple women they are beautiful by saying "Vous êtes belles." This is the plural form of the equation, but the translation is the same. [3] X Research source Note how you cannot just add an "s" to belles, you need to use the plural form of "you are" as well -- "Vous êtes." Pronounce this as "vooz eht bell."

steps.title: Learn synonyms for the word "beautiful" in French.
steps.content: Learn synonyms for the word "beautiful" in French. If you want to spice up your romantic vocabulary, there are a lot of words that you can substitute for "belle." [4] X Research source Try out these, adding them in the phrases "Tu es _____" or "Vous êtes ____:" Jolie: Pretty Mignonne: Cute Superbe, Splendide: Gorgeous Séduisante: Alluring or attractive Une jolie femme: A beautiful woman. Tu es la plus belle fille que j'ai jamais vue: You are the most beautiful girl I have ever seen.

steps.title: Tell a man he is beautiful with "Tu es beau."
steps.content: Tell a man he is beautiful with "Tu es beau." The male form of the word beautiful is "beau." Beau has the same meaning as the female word "belle," but it is male version of the word. Pronounce this "two eh boh" "Beau" is often translated as "Handsome" when speaking about a male.

steps.title: Use the formal "vous êtes beau" when talking to superiors, the elderly, or distinguished people.
steps.content: Use the formal "vous êtes beau" when talking to superiors, the elderly, or distinguished people. "Vous" is the formal version of "tu," and is used in proper conversation. Though there is no hard and fast rule for when to use "vous," a good rule of thumb is to use it for anyone you would refer to as "Mr." in English [5] X Research source Pronounce this as "vooz eht boh."

steps.title: Tell multiple men they are beautiful or handsome by saying "Vous êtes beaux."
steps.content: Tell multiple men they are beautiful or handsome by saying "Vous êtes beaux." This is the plural form of the equation, but the translation is the same. To make the word ending in "au" plural, you need to add an "x", making "beaux." You need to use the plural form of "you are" as well -- "Vous êtes _____" Pronounce this as "vooz eht boh." The "x" is silent.

steps.title: Learn synonyms for "beautiful/handsome" in French.
steps.content: Learn synonyms for "beautiful/handsome" in French. If you want to spice up your romantic vocabulary, there are a lot of words that you can substitute for "beau." [6] X Research source Try out these, adding them in the phrases "Tu es _____" or "Vous êtes ____:" Joli: Pretty Mignon: Cute Superb, Splendid: Gorgeous Séduisant: Alluring or attractive Un bel homme: a handsome man. Tu es le plus beau garçon que j'ai jamais vu: You are the most beautiful boy I've ever seen.
